metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9558 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
(1) libdwarf/dwarf_leb.c and (2) dwarfdump/print_frames.c in libdwarf before 20161124 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted bit pattern in a signed leb number, aka a "negation overflow."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9558` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20161124-1
libdwarf1 - 20161124-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161124-1').
